title: Linking Learning Analytics and Instructional Design: Practical Applications Through a Systematic Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogical knowledge and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: A competency-focused program for practicing professionals, emphasizing the integration of learning analytics and instructional design. Includes hands-on practice in data-driven lesson design and evaluation using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the relationship between learning design elements and analytical metrics
Learners can apply procedures for collecting and interpreting learning analytics data in actual classroom contexts
Learners can propose data-driven learning design improvements and utilize them for formative assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
